Question: What color is the jacket near the gloves?

Reference Answer: green

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/n317189.jpg

Original program:

```
BOX0=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='gloves')
IMAGE0=CROP_NEAR(image=IMAGE,box=BOX0)
BOX1=LOC(image=IMAGE0,object='jacket')
IMAGE1=CROP(image=IMAGE0,box=BOX1)
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE1,question='What color is the jacket?')
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question="What color is the jacket near the gloves?")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='What color is the jacket near the gloves?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>green</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>green</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: green
